user.title: Quick Timer
user.description: This integration allows you to schedule one-time actions for any entity with a countdown timer. Click submit to install.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of Quick Timer is allowed.

run_action.name: Run Action
run_action.description: Schedule a one-time action (on/off/toggle) for any entity with a countdown.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity to perform the action on.

delay.name: Delay
delay.description: The delay in minutes before the action is executed.

action.name: Action
action.description: The action to perform (on, off, or toggle).

notify.name: Notify
notify.description: Whether to send notifications about the scheduled action.

cancel_action.name: Cancel Action
cancel_action.description: Cancel a scheduled action for an entity.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity to cancel the scheduled action for.
